text: is a Japanese football player. ==Biography== Watanabe was born in Kawasaki on October 18, 1998. He joined J2 League club Tokyo Verdy from their youth team in 2016. He played 90 matches for the club in 4 seasons. In August 2019, he moved to J1 League club Yokohama F. Marinos. Yokohama won the J1 champions in 2019.
